# AI Learning Platform - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js 14+ AI learning platform with multiple study modes including flashcards, quizzes, study guides, summarization, and AI tutor chat.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- OpenAI API (GPT-4 Turbo + Whisper + TTS)
- React Hooks for state management
- File upload processing

## Key Features
✅ AI-powered flashcard generation
✅ Interactive quiz creation with scoring
✅ Comprehensive study guide generation
✅ Content summarization
✅ AI tutor chat with context awareness
✅ Voice interaction (speech-to-text)
✅ Document upload and processing
✅ Subject-specific learning
✅ Progress tracking
✅ Mobile-responsive design

## Pages
- `/` - Landing page with features showcase
- `/study` - Study dashboard with all modes (flashcards, quiz, guide, summary)
- `/tutor` - AI tutor chat interface

## Next Steps
1. Add your OpenAI API key to `.env.local`
2. Run `npm run dev`
3. Test all study modes
4. Optional: Add Firebase for user authentication
